tr.td: Human adenocarcinoma of the mammary gland, breast; derived from metastatic site: pleural effusion

MCF-7 CD95 ΔshR6 clone #21 with homozygous 227 nucleotide deletion of the shR6 target site in CD95 (chr10:89,008,920–89,009,146; Human Dec. 2013 GRCh38/hg38 assembly) produced using CRISPR/Cas9 technology; verified homozygous CD95 protein knockout

MCF-7 CD95 deletion clone FA4 with a homozygous deletion of the entire CD95 gene (chr10:88,990,657–89,015,785; Human Dec. 2013 GRCh38/hg38 assembly) produced using CRISPR/Cas9 technology; verified homozygous CD95 protein knockout
Human high grade ovarian serous adenocarcinoma; derived from parent Hey cells (RRID: CVCL_0297)
HeyA8 shR6 k.o. clone #11, HeyA8 CD95 k.o.

HeyA8 CD95 k.o. clone with a homozygous 227 nucleotide deletion of the shR6 target site in CD95 (chr10:89,008,920–89,009,146; Human Dec. 2013 GRCh38/hg38 assembly) produced using CRISPR/Cas9 technology; verified homozygous CD95 protein knockout
Korean Collection for Type Cultures (KCTC); PMID: 26976605

HCT116 clone #40 with homozygous knockout of Drosha protein; knockout achieved using CRISPR/Cas9 which resulted in a single nucleotide insertion in one allele and a 26 nucleotide deletion in the other
Korean Collection for Type Cultures (KCTC); PMID: 26976606

HCT116 clone #43 with homozygous knockout of Dicer protein; knockout achieved using CRISPR/Cas9 which resulted in a three nucleotide insertion and 14 nucleotide deletion in one allele and a 35 nucleotide deletion in the other
Korean Collection for Type Cultures (KCTC); PMID: 26976607
HCT116 clone #45 with homozygous knockout of Dicer protein; knockout achieved using CRISPR/Cas9 which resulted in a 53 nucleotide deletion in one allele and a 28 nucleotide deletion in the other
Derived from HEK293 cells (ATCC: CRL-1573); express large T antigen; used for packaging viruses
Mouse hepatocellular carcinoma isolated from naturally occurring tumor in a floxed CD95 background
Anti-Human CD178 antibody (Mouse IgG1) Clone G247-4
1 μg/ml; for western blot; primary Ab
Leucine zipper tagged CD95L; recombinant protein
Detects ATP release as a surrogate for cell death; read-out is fluorescence
Used for subG1 flow cytometry analysis
Used for selection of cells expressing puromycin resistance cassettes
Dye used for detecting ROS production
Used at 20 uM; pan caspase inhibitor
pLenti control empty lentiviral vector; carries an RFP-2a-puromycin resistance cassette
pLenti-GIII-CMV-RFP-2A-Puro vector that expresses human wild type CD95L cDNA (NM_000639.2); used to express wt human CD95L upon infection with lentiviral particles

pLenti-GIII-CMV-RFP-2A-Puro vector that expresses human CD95L cDNA (NM_000639.2) with two nucleotide substitutions in codon 218 (TAT - > CGT) resulting in replacement of tyrosine for arginine (Y218R mutation); unable to bind CD95

pLenti-GIII-CMV-RFP-2A-Puro vector that expresses human CD95L cDNA (NM_000639.2) with both the Y218R mutation and a single nucleotide substitution at the second codon (CAG - > TAG), resulting in a premature stop codon right after the start codon

pLenti-GIII-CMV-RFP-2A-Puro vector that expresses human CD95L cDNA (NM_000639.2) with all codons containing synonymous mutations except for select codons in the proline-rich domain to meet IDT synthesis criteria

455 nucleotide CRISPR/Cas9 gRNA scaffold synthesized as a gene block; contains promoter, gRNA scaffold, target sequence, and termination sequence; scaffold transcribes gRNAs that target Cas9 endonuclease to cut at target sites; target sequences consist of 19 nucleotides that are complementary to the target site of choice; co-transfected with Cas9 to catalyze cleavage.

pLenti-GIII-CMV-RFP-2A-Puro vector that expresses human CD95L cDNA (NM_000639.2) with the Y218R mutation, and two additional single nucleotide substitutions; one at the second codon (CAG - > TAG), resulting in a premature stop codon right after the start codon, and another, G258A, resulting in the replacement of a methionine with an isoleucine, thus removing the alternative translational start site.
Plasmid that expresses a human codon-optimized Cas9 tagged with GFP and HA; used to express Cas9 for CRISPR-mediated deletions.
Transfection reagent; used for transfection of small RNAs such as siRNAs
Used to blunt-end clone the gRNA scaffolds into the pSC-B plasmid
Fr primer that flanks shR6 site; used to detect 227 nt shR6 deletion; 5’-GGTGTCATGCTGTGACTGTTG-3’
Rev primer that flanks shR6 site; used to detect 227 nt shR6 deletion; 5’-TTTAGCTTAAGTGGCCAGCAA-3’
Rev primer that overlaps with the shR6 site; used to detect 227 nt shR6 deletion; 5’-AAGTTGGTTTACATCTGCAC-3’
Fr primer that flanks the CD95 gene; used to detect CD95 gene deletion; 5’-TGTTTAATATAGCTGGGGCTATGC-3'
Rev primer that flanks the CD95 gene; used to detect CD95 gene deletion; 5’-TGGGACTCATGGGTTAAATAGAAT-3’
Rev internal primer that targets within the CD95 gene; used to detect CD95 gene deletion; 5’-GACCAGTCTTCTCATTTCAGAGGT-3’
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 7 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’-AUUGGGCCUG GGGAUGUUU-3'; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 7 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’-CCUGGGGAU GUUUCAGCUC-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 11 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’-CCAACUCAAGG UCCAUGCC-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 15 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’-AAACUGGGCUGU ACUUUGU-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 15 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’- AACUGGGCUGU ACUUUGUA-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 16 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’- CAACAACCUGCC CCUGAGC-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 16 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’- AACUCUAAGCG UCCCCAGG-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 21 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’- UCAACGUAUC UGAGCUCUC-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
custom siRNA; antisense strand corresponds to cluster 22 CD95L sequence
antisense: 5’- AAUCUCAGACG UUUUUCGG-3’; antisense strand designed with 3' deoxy AA; complementary sense strand has 3' deoxy TT and 2'-O-methylation at the first two positions
siRNA pool designed to target AGO2
Custom RT-qPCR primer designed using the Thermofisher Scientific design tool to detect CD95LSIL mRNA

Custom RT-qPCR primer designed using the Thermofisher Scientific design tool at https://www.thermofisher.com/order/custom- genomic-products/tools/small-rna to specifically detect small RNAs from cluster 8 of CD95L (5’- AAGGAGCTGGCAGAACTCCGAGA-3’)

Custom RT-qPCR primer designed using the Thermofisher Scientific design tool at https://www.thermofisher.com/order/custom- genomic-products/tools/small-rna to specifically detect small RNAs from cluster 21 of CD95L (5’- TCAACGTATCTGAGCTCTCTC-3’)
RT-qPCR for small RNA; control probe
Peptide derived from GW182/TNRC6B used to pull down AGO1 to 4
